html:
Planes doing circles
While the sun is heading down
Sweets and water fill my stomach
Silly laughter sounds from time to time
A ringing phone disrupts the silence
There is nothing to talk about
Tiredness gots on my eyes
All the work for today is done
I’ve dint build a robot again
I’ve explained a communist
How wrong he is about PPR
We got a new water delivery
The blinds roll themselves up
A supernova just exploded
With a megagigantic, cosmic blast
And the damned burn in hell for millenias
title: Supernova
